section.name: Switch
section.p: Task definition for the ANT task to switch on a particular value.

tr.td: Should we do case insensitive comparisons?

subsection.name: Parameters specified as nested elements
subsection.p: At least one case or default is required.
An individual case to consider, if the value that is being switched on matches to value attribute of the case, then the nested tasks will be executed.

tr.td: The value to match against the tasks value attribute.

subsection.p: The default case for when no match is found. Must not appear more than once per task.

subsection.name: Example
subsection.source: <switch value="${foo}"> <case value="bar"> <echo message="The value of property foo is bar"/> </case> <case value="baz"> <echo message="The value of property foo is baz"/> </case> <default> <echo message="The value of property foo is not sensible"/> </default> </switch>
